1.caption_en:
A two-row, three-phase funnel/timeline diagram showing expanding curved segments labeled "PHASE 1", "PHASE 2", and "PHASE 3", with dashed curved separators and light blue shading. The phase labels sit in a central horizontal white band between the mirrored top and bottom segment rows.
